JLPT N5 Vocab with Kanji: 三日 (3rd day of the month)
四日 (4th day of the month)
五日 (5th day of the month)
六日 (6th day of the month)
七日 (7th day of the month)
八日 (8th day of the month)
九日 (9th day of the month)
十日 (10th day of the month)
今年 (this year), 去年 (last year)

English Meaning: Minute, part, to understand, to divide

JLPT N5 Vocab with Kanji: 今晩 (this evening), 今朝 (this morning)
先週 (last week), 先生 (teacher, master)
来月 (next month), 来る (to come)
何曜日 (what day of the week)

English Meaning: Life, to live, to be born, to grow

JLPT N5 Vocab with Kanji: 駅前 (in front of the station)

English Meaning: To see, to be visible, to show
To hear, to listen, to ask

JLPT N5 Vocab with Kanji: 休む (to take a day off)
